settings.interval_updated: âœ… Notification interval updated to {hours} hours
settings.interval_instructions:
Enter new value (1-24 hours):

Examples:
â€¢ 1 - every 60 minutes
â€¢ 2 - every 2 hours
â€¢ 6 - every 6 hours
â€¢ 24 - once a day

Type /cancel to abort
settings.interval_minutes_instructions:
Enter new value in minutes (1-1440):

Examples:
â€¢ 1 - every 1 minute (for testing)
â€¢ 60 - every 60 minutes
â€¢ 120 - every 2 hours
â€¢ 1440 - once a day

Type /cancel to abort
